page.title: 16A JUNIOR SCHOOLTEACHER'S DAY
page.content: At 6.30 I make breakfast then begin the 13 mile motorbike journey to school which takes 20 minutes. At 8.30 I prepare work for the first lesson on the blackboard, review part of a computer program, register my class and take them to assembly. Maths occupies us until 10.40 then I have a cup of coffee while the children have playtime. Today we are rehearsing our short play called "The Clown who lost his Smile" in which everyone in the class has a part. My next job is to supervise school dinner and in the afternoon the class of 15 special need children take part in the Domesday Survey, checking the amenities and talking to local people. At 3.15 school finishes but I still have some books to mark. In the evening I instruct sub aqua diving for the youth club. A welcome "pint" ends the day.
